alert.note: Alert for Perry (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 15 at 2:30PM CDT until May 15 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL PERRY COUNTY... At 230 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Adona, or 8 miles southwest of Perryville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Perryville... Wye Mountain... Williams Junction... Antioch in Perry County... Long Mountain... Thornburg... Pleasant Valley in Perry County... Oak Grove in Perry County... Cherry Hill in Perry County... Wye... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
